Name: WarZone
About the game: WarZone An old school style game where you taking a role of a tough soldier that has been sent to infiltrate an enemy base and destroy it. Type of game Top Down 3d shooter game with a linear action moving upwards game characteristics Change Player Choose level of difficulty Fight enemies , drones , tanks , human controlled turrets and robots Use grenades , tanks , updated weapon Pick up heath aid , ammo , grenades , shield Do what ever it takes to complete your mission Reach the highest score possible and get the first place on the score board You can play this game on any device with windows installed and have a lot of fun . Just make sure you have the requirements to run the game , which is not very high for a low end system. This game is inspired from the old school top down shooters that were played back in the 90's.
Meta Title: WarZone: Feb 19, 2023, Jim Dex Games and Full Overview
